alert.note: Alert for Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 11:27PM PST until February 14 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of around 1 inch, except 1 to 3 inches in the hills. * WHERE...In Oregon, Lower Columbia. In Washington, I-5 Corridor in Cowlitz County. * WHEN...Until 7 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will likely impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County
